Developer Terms of Use
des:
Connect your Jotto account and ask Alexa to search for your available Jotto devices.
For example, you can set the temperature of the kitchen with "Alexa, set kitchen to 15 degrees" or ask for the temperature of the bathroom with "Alexa, what is the temperature of the bathroom?".

* Use the name you have already defined - this is indicated in your Jotto app where you can also change the name.

* Create an Alexa group, such as "Bedroom" and add the device (s) to the group
